channel.title: Milan on Benjamin Gravesteijn
channel.description: Recent content in Milan on Benjamin Gravesteijn

item.title: Writer's visit to Milan
item.description: “Retire me to my Milan, where every third thought shall be my grave.” William Shakespeare Visiting Milan to write a paper at the Ospedale Maggiore Policlinico di Milano: sounds like the most inspiring place to write, right? I know a professor who likes to come here for a week to write books, or funding applications. But now it’s my turn to be inspired by the city of fashion, the most cultivated and wealthiest city of Italy: the country of love.
